story.heading: Rooted in Passion, Built on Precision
story.subtitle: From our founding to becoming a trusted name across Zurich.
paragraphs: Founded with a deep passion for nature and craftsmanship, Dzaferi-Gartenbau has grown from small beginnings to become a trusted provider of premium garden landscaping across the Zurich region.
We do not just build gardens - we create living spaces that enhance quality of life. Rooted in passion and refined by experience, our team brings Swiss precision to every project.
Nature is our inspiration; precision is our promise. Your vision, our expertise.

cards.title: Our Vision
cards.description: To create timeless outdoor spaces that harmonize nature, functionality, and craftsmanship - enhancing the way people live and connect with their surroundings.

cards.title: Our Mission
cards.description: Our mission is to design and build high-quality gardens and outdoor environments through thoughtful planning, sustainable practices, and precise execution. We work closely with our clients to deliver durable, beautiful results that stand the test of time.
